body: Let's see. The IDF is generated by OS via the HB component. I checked the idf, and the output command is in there.  Here's the point in the file where the component comes in (at the scribble "VIEW SURFACE RESULTS"): [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hiLZfGggQjPyOaxpdqE9Kx*FFGuDxDQPV4tX9SX-Gw985dDSW*NVQDU4Bq8nw8FTkRc4nFkJFCpsXjbTpnHjIufaASg5pZ2C/Clipboard01.png) Rather than chop down the file, I disabled the large swaths of stuff that don't directly apply...which means the file is too big to attach here. if it's not coming through hydra, here's an old fashion dropbox link: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/xgqpo64e5871m2i/Xmas%20_5.3.1.gh?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xgqpo64e5871m2i/Xmas%20_5.3.1.gh?dl=0) Thanks for taking a look!
